meanings.sent1: I am republishing my book for more people to read.
meanings.sent2: The author is considering republishing the novel with a new cover.
meanings.sent3: After realizing his mistake, he decided to republishing the corrected version.
meanings.sent4: Her decision to republishing her old poems breathed new life into her writing career.
meanings.sent5: The online magazine is republishing its popular articles from last year.

meanings.definition: The act of publishing something again.
meanings.sent1: The republishing of the newspaper article sparked a debate.
meanings.sent2: We are discussing the benefits of republishing old research papers.
meanings.sent3: The sudden republishing of the cookbook caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent4: The republishing of the classic novel brought joy to many readers.
meanings.sent5: The republishing of the magazine issue was met with great enthusiasm.
